title: Will 4G sim work with Pixel 5?
content:
I want to purchase Pixel 5 or 4a(5g). I have some questions.

1. If I purchase Pixel 5 or 4a (5g) unlocked, but use a 4G sim, will it work? Or is it required to have 5G sim?

2. If I purchase Pixel 4a Verizon (US), can I use a different Sim with it with 4G network?
